about.title: About Velvet Berlin
about.subtitle: Your premier independent advertising platform for high-class escort services in Berlin.
about.description_1: Velvet Berlin is an online platform where you can discover premium escort contacts in Berlin. We are a pure information portal — here you will find beautiful photos, detailed information, and direct contact details.
about.description_2: If you are looking for relaxed adult entertainment tailored to your taste, you have made the right choice visiting our elegantly designed platform.
about.disclaimer: We expressly point out that all ladies, clubs, and agencies listed on Velvet Berlin are advertising clients and are NOT employed by or acting on behalf of Velvet Berlin.
about.offer_intro: Our platform offers an extensive and diverse selection, yet remains clear and easy to navigate.
about.feature_profiles_desc: All profiles are reviewed before publication — no fake profiles.
about.feature_variety_desc: From private models to high-class escorts, find the perfect match for your preferences.
about.feature_current_desc: Up-to-date listings with the latest availability and new arrivals.
about.feature_contact_desc: Get photos, information, and contact details — communicate directly.
about.security_verification_desc: All profiles are reviewed before publication.
about.escorts_intro: Velvet Berlin is a platform for publishing escort profiles in Berlin.
about.escorts_benefit_2: Guaranteed target audience for premium companion services
about.escorts_benefit_3: Flexible working conditions and full control
about.escorts_benefit_4: Professional presentation with high-quality profile pages
about.step_1_desc: Create your account and build your profile.
about.cta_desc: Velvet Berlin — your secure and exclusive platform for premium escort services in Berlin.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How quickly will my profile go live?
faq.a1: After photo verification, your profile goes live within 24 hours. Premium packages often go live within a few hours.
faq.q2: Can I upgrade my package later?
faq.a2: Yes, anytime! You only pay the difference. The remaining balance is credited proportionally.
faq.q3: What happens when my package expires?
faq.a3: Your profile remains visible but won't be featured. You'll receive a timely reminder to renew.

final_cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
final_cta.desc: Join over 500 successful models and agencies. Start with Velvet Berlin today.

legal.section_1_content: By accessing and using Velvet Berlin, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our platform.
legal.section_2_content: Velvet Berlin is an independent advertising platform that displays profiles and contact information for escorts, companions, and agencies in Berlin. We are solely a directory service and do not employ, manage, or represent any individuals listed on this platform.
legal.section_3_content: You must be at least 18 years of age to use this platform. By using Velvet Berlin, you confirm that you meet this age requirement and have the legal capacity to enter into this agreement.
legal.section_4_content: Users agree not to use the platform for any illegal purposes, to harass or abuse other users, to post false or misleading information, or to violate any applicable laws or regulations.
legal.section_5_content: Velvet Berlin makes no representations or warranties about the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of any content on this platform. All arrangements made through contacts found on this platform are made directly between the parties involved.
legal.section_6_content: Velvet Berlin shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our services.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_content: Velvet Berlin is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our platform.
privacy.data_collection_content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as account information (username, email), profile data for advertisers, and usage data through cookies and analytics.
privacy.data_usage_content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process transactions, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform.
privacy.cookies_content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and remember your preferences. You can control cookie settings through your browser.
privacy.rights_content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also request data portability or object to certain processing activities. Contact us to exercise these rights.
privacy.contact_content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through our website or email.
